title: Bug 120216Group dialog should be showed even dataset is not set.
OB: When adding a table report item without setting the data set, and attempting to create a new table group, the group dialog is not displayed.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed even if the dataset is not defined. Users should be able to define a group, even if the dataset is not set.
SR:
1. Open the software.
2. Add a table report item without setting the data set.
3. Try to create a new table group.
4. Observe if the group dialog is displayed or not.
